directions.text: Heat oil in saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in rice and cook for 2 mins.
Add salt and 1 ¼ cups of water then bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to as low as possible, cover for 20 mins.
Remove from heat, remove lid, and put a dish towel over the pan.
Let sit for 10 mins and then fluff with a fork.
